lines: 1. Nitie piny moro maber chutho;Koroni pod wanene gi chien;Nyasachwa oritowa kanyo,Olosonwa kar dak e polo.
Wanamor nyaka chieng`,Wanamor kwatundo e polo;Wanamor nyaka chieng`,Wanamor kwatundo e polo.
2. Wanawer e polo nyaka chieng`,Wer mamit mar jogo molocho;Kendo chunywa ok none kuyo,Kata chandruok moro nyaka chieng`.
3. Ruoth Nyasachwa ong`won gilalaWagoyone erokamano,Nikech wuode ma nochiwonwa,To gi gwethne mosemiyowa.
